trans-unit.source: Represents a flow content element used to group <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> elements within a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Table"></xref>.
This class provides a way to arbitrarily group rows within a table; every row in a table must belong to a row grouping.
Rows within a row group often share a common intent, and can be styled as a group.
A common use for row groupings is to separate special-purpose rows, such as a title, header, and footer rows, from the primary content contained by the table.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref> class.

Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> objects that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> element (i.e. add/remove rows).

A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> elements that comprise the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref>.
This property has no default value.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows"></xref> property should be persisted.
This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup.Rows%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.

You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup>.
`true` if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, `false`.
Adds a table row to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRowGroup"></xref> collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.TableRow"></xref> to add to the collection.
Adds the text content of a node to the object.
The text to add to the object.
